modName: The Dragonborn Comes -Cover by Karliene Raynolds-
summary:
A great replacement for the main menu of Skyrim, by Karliene Raynolds.
The folder contains a cover of \"The Dragronborn Comes\".
For more information, read ReadMe.txt
descriptionHtml:
This song was performed by Karliene Raynolds. See the video section for the  [color=red]ORIGINAL VIDEO.[/color] She has full permission for the use of her song, in this mod.

In 22/08/2012, Karliene released her cover of \"The Dragonborn Comes\" on You Tube.
This particular version adds some drums and a sample of the Nordic choir used in the soundtrack.

The process was simple. I downloaded her  [color=red]FREELY[/color] provided mp3 of the audio (removing the first 10 seconds with Audacity) and converted it into .WAV, and as final step into .XWM

You can install it manually. For more information, read the \"ReadMe\"

That\'s all. Have fun.
(Sorry for my bad english)
author: cristhdyl9551
